name: Simple Matrix Game
description:
Install instructions

How to play:

  • You are the player (blue square)
  • Use WASD to move around (press for a single step, hold for making multiple steps)
  • avoid the red projectiles
  • You have to collect the green squares (checkpoints) to unlock the finish in the bottom right
  • you have to collect all checkpoints and reach the finish in the given time to succed (so be fast!)
  • You can pause the game by pressing 'P'
